title: Adverse experiences in childhood and young adulthood, genetic susceptibility, and neurodegenerative disease incidence: a lifespan analysis.
abstract: Exposure to adverse childhood experiences (ACEs) was associated with dementia and Parkinsonâ€™s disease (PD).ACEs could additively interact with adverse adulthood experiences (AAEs) and genetic susceptibility to escalate dementia risk.
